priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Microbiology Findings Test Details Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C174225

self.title: CDISC SDTM Microbiology Findings Test Details Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the additional descriptions of the test being performed to produce the microbiology finding.
name: Microbiology Findings Test Details
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Microbiology Findings Test Details Terminology

terms.definition: A measurement of the total cells of a pre-specified type in a specimen.
A measurement of the total number of microbial colonies of a pre-specified microorganism in a specimen.
The determination of presence or absence of an entity in a specimen.

The cycle number where the fluorescence of the target is detected above the background signal or a pre-set threshold. This value may be used for the computation of the concentration of a target in a polymerase chain reaction (PCR).
The determination of the quantity of a pre-specified analyte in a specimen.
A measurement of the total number of viral particles of a pre-specified virus in a specimen.
